description:
* Based on http://anidb.net/cr26482 [Sugimoto Iqura]`s seinen manga series.
The last thing freshman http://anidb.net/ch87981 [Koshiyama Shiki] expected was to be asked to join the Bunzo High School New Student Fast Finger Quiz Championship. A bookwork at heart, he hates being the center of attention and shudders at the mere thought of participating. To add insult to injury, his classmate http://anidb.net/ch87980 [Fukami Mari] overwhelms her competition by pressing the buzzer even before the entire question is read. It`s too late to hit the buzzer after you know the answer. A split second is all it takes to determine who wins or loses, she declares.
After observing Mari for a while, Shiki discovers a way to determine the answers to a quiz. His world expands as he meets colleagues and senior members of the Quiz Club, as well as their formidable rival http://anidb.net/ch87982 [Mikuriya Chisato]. He experiences the joys of answering correctly and the frustrations of not getting to the buzzer quickly enough. He and his colleagues hone not only their knowledge, but also various techniques as they pursue victory in the world of competitive quiz.
Source: ANN
Note: The first two episodes received an early screening at a special event held at United Cinemas Aqua City Odaiba in Tokyo on 02.07.2017.

REGULAR.description:
Koshiyama Shiki, a new enrollee at Buzou High School, is a bookworm and quite the introverted type. He even eats lunch in the school library. But at the ceremony to welcome new students, he found himself volunteered to participate in an impromptu quiz meet by the quiz bowl circle`s leader, Sasajima Gakuto. Shiki knows the answers to all the questions, but it unable to buzz in quickly enough... until he notices a change in his classmate, Fukami Mari, who starts buzzing in to answer questions before they`ve even been read!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t You Want to Become a Quiz King?
Et toi, si tu devenais le roi du quiz ?
キミもクイズ王にならないか?

REGULAR.description:
Having discovered Shiki`s wealth of knowledge and quick thinking, Mari tries to get him to join the quiz bowl circle. Shiki is hesitant, but lets Mari talk him into accompanying her to Sekigawata High School to observe a quiz meet. Inoue Daisuke, who wants to get closer to Mari, also shows up... and it turns out both of them have already been entered in the meet by Sasajima! They`re about to have their first glimpse of the world of quiz bowl...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le monde en un centième de seconde ?!

REGULAR.description:
The quiz meet between Sekigawata, Miyaura, Asagaoka, and Buzou High Schools has begun. Shiki and Mari have won their way through the first round, but Shiki struggles with some of the most commonly asked questions in quiz bowl, known as "classics." As Mikuriya Chisato of Miyaura High School keeps getting one right answer after another, Shiki is beginning to feel frustrated by his inability to predict the latter half of the questions given. Will he be able to buzz in when it comes down to it?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Want the Right to Answer /
« Si tu veux avoir la main / »

REGULAR.description:
Shiki has experienced the fun and profound depths of quiz bowl. As he`s on his way to school with passion for quiz bowl on his mind, he catches sight of Sasajima with a girl on the back of his bicycle. Still wondering what his relationship with the girl is, Shiki and Inoue decide to join the quiz bowl circle. When Sasajima asks them if they have any questions after experiencing their first quiz meet, Mari raises her hand and asks, "How can we win in quiz bowl?!"
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 謎の美少女登場ですが,

REGULAR.description:
The girl Shiki met in the library was the same girl that he had seen riding on the back of Sasajima`s bike. The book she left behind has a marker stuck to the page on building quiz bowl buzzer systems. Is she involved with quiz bowl? As Shiki is thinking about all his, Mari tells him they`re having a joint quiz bowl practice with another school today. That school turns out to be Miyaura High, the team that claims Mikuriya as a member!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 文蔵vs宮浦! ピコーン♪

REGULAR.description:
As Mari and Kouzuki Yuki are working at their part-time job in Akihabara to earn money for a buzzer set, Shiki and Inoue arrive in the area to train themselves with a quiz bowl game in the arcade. They`re battling against a player called "Second Lieutenant Chisato" when Ashiya shows up, and the pair finds out that their opponent is someone they know quite well. Then a strange, somewhat suspicious character approaches the group...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A. Maid B. Chuusa C. Koakuma
A. Maid B. Lieutenant C. Petit démon
A. Maid B. Lieutenant Colonel C. Little Devil
A.メイド B.チュウサ C.コアクマ

REGULAR.description:
Mikuriya`s declaration of war to Shiki rings in his ears: "Don`t forget about the regular meet!" The regular meet is a regularly held quiz bowl tournament hosted alternately by several area schools. This year`s host is Asagaoka Girls` High School. It`s been decided that all the members of Buzou High`s quiz team, so they`re beginning a rigorous practice schedule. Meanwhile, Mari is asked why she got into quiz bowl, and tells the story of how her brother, Fukami Shinji, influenced her love of the activity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Questions qui sont maintenant du passé...

REGULAR.description:
The regular meet at Asagaoka begins at last! In addition to Buzou, Miyaura, and Sekigawata, other participating teams include Yokohama`s Kannami University High School, whose quiz club`s president is Hanabusa Minoru, and Chiba`s Leoneil High School, whose club`s president is Tozuka Koutarou. Then the veteran team led by Ohkura Kunimitsu, the powerful Kaijou Academy, also arrives. Shiki and his teammates take on the first round, a paper quiz, and the second round, a fastest finger contest that divides the participants up into pairs!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: \ごきげんよう/ 麻ヶ丘例会!

REGULAR.description:
Round 2 of the regular meet at Asagaoka reaches its climax! This time it`s Shiki`s turn at the buzzer, and he`s determined to keep winning until he gets his revenge match against Mikuriya. He`s been paired with Sonohara Akira, a Sekigawata Middle School third-year. But in contrast to his cute appearance, Akira is quite a tricky player, throwing Shiki off his stride and bringing an atmosphere of unrest to the meet...
Source: crunchyroll

The intense second round of the regular meet at Asagaoka is over! Murmurs are still echoing in the venue over Akira`s provocative behavior as the contest enters round 3. The players are divided into two groups for a fastest finger board quiz. Sasajima and Mari are in the first group, but Mari is flustered when she learns that Sasajima was once a member of Kaijou`s quiz team. Does it have anything to do with why her brother quit quiz bowl? Her thoughts leave her unable to concentrate on the meet...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: とびきりの超エース様☆

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for the second group in round 3 of the regular meet at Asagaoka! The showdown between rivals Shiki and Mikuriya finally becomes reality, but once again, Akira causes a commotion. Quiz bowl is no more than a game to him. Still, Mikuriya remains calm and proactively buzzes in to answer questions. Shiki also racks up points, determined not to let this match end like his last one. Will he succeed in taking revenge on Mikuriya?!
Source: crunchyroll

Round 3 of the regular meet at Asagaoka reaches its climax! Two have already emerged as winners, leaving room for only one more to advance to the next round! Shiki, Mikuriya, and Akira all use their unique abilities to the fullest as the intense back-and-forth battle continues. The contest for a seat in the semifinal round, with each player`s pride on the line, comes down to the final question... Who will emerge victorious?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A. Parce que le quiz est là !
A. Soko ni Quiz ga Aru kara!
A. そこにクイズがあるから!
A: Because the Question Is There!
ナナマル サンバツ
